rooms.description: Main entrance with open design and wheelchair ramp compliant access.
Spacious living area adjacent to courtyard for natural light and ventilation, with Vastu-aligned east exposure.
Compact eco-friendly kitchen designed with energy-efficient appliances; easily accessible from the living room.
Spacious bedroom ensuring wheelchair accessibility and optimal Vastu alignment in the southwest quadrant for calm energy.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom with grab bars and non-slip flooring.

openings.description: Large door with automatic sensor for wheelchair access.
Energy-efficient double-glazed windows placed strategically per Vastu guidelines to maximize natural light and ventilation.
Archway connecting living room to central courtyard ensuring open space for eco-friendly design.
Large window in the living area for enhanced light exposure and ventilation, following Vastu recommendations.

special_features.description: An internal courtyard integrated with greenery to promote natural cooling and air circulation as per sustainable design principles.
A dedicated multi-use space within the living area convertible into a home theater setup, with adjustable lighting and soundproofing for energy efficiency.
